00053 
00054 void TemplateFileWriterTest::testmethod_WriteFile()
00055 {
00056         TemplateData templ;
00057 
00058         templ.CreatedBy() = L"ljevon";
00059         templ.CreationDateTime() = L"datetime";
00060         templ.TemplateFileIdentifier() = "id";
00061 
00062         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &userParams = templ.UserAttributes();
00063         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType vparam;
00064 
00065         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-1") ;
00066         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00067         vparam.HasDefault() = false;
00068         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType;
00069         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear() ;
00070         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00071 
00072         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-2") ;
00073         vparam.SetDefaultValueFloat(2.0);
00074         vparam.HasDefault() = true;
00075         vparam.RequiredFlag() = true;
00076         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType;
00077         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear()  ;
00078         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00079 
00080         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-3") ;
00081         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00082         vparam.HasDefault() = false;
00083         vparam.ValueType() = ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType;
00084         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"one");
00085         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"two");
00086         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"three");
00087         userParams.push_back(vparam);
00088 
00089 
00090         // Write the file.
00091         const std::string TEST_FILE = "./test.file.templ";
00092         TemplateFileWriter writer;
00093         writer.Write(TEST_FILE, templ);
00094 
00095         // Read the file.
00096         TemplateFileReader reader;
00097         templ.Clear();
00098         reader.Read(TEST_FILE, templ);
00099 
00100 
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(templ.CreatedBy() == L"ljevon");
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(templ.CreationDateTime() == L"datetime");
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(templ.TemplateFileIdentifier() == "id");
00104 
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( templ.DataTypeIdentifier() == TEMPLATE_FILE_TYPE_IDENTIFIER );
00106 
00107         // User attributes
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( templ.UserAttributes().size() == 3 );
00109 
00110         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator userAttIt = templ.UserAttributes().begin();
00111 
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-1" );
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetValueText() == L"" );
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == false);
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::TextParameterType);
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00117         ++userAttIt;
00118 
00119 
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-2" );
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL( (*userAttIt).GetDefaultValueFloat(), 2, 0.0001);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == true);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::FloatParameterType);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00125         ++userAttIt;
00126 
00127 
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).GetName() == L"user-att-name-3" );
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).RequiredFlag() == false);
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ValueType() == ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType::ControlMultiParameterType);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlMultiValues().size() == 0 );
00132         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator cIt;
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 3 );
00134         cIt = (*userAttIt).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"one" );
00136         ++cIt;
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"two" );
00138         ++cIt;
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*cIt) == L"three" );
00140 }
